content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for expressing interest in our apartment. To commence the negotiation, let's start discussing the desired rental price. Please propose an amount that works for you. If I find it agreeable, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, I may need to suggest adjustments. TERMINATE when we reach an understanding or if no consensus is reached.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
